title: Super Robot Wars V + 2 DLCs
body:
Super Robot Wars V + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Strategy, Tactics, Isometric, 3D, Turn-based, Mecha
Companies: B.B. Studio, Bandai Namco Entertainment
Languages: ENG/MULTI4
Original Size: 9.5 GB
Repack Size: 4.5 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive + 2 (Uploaded by Uria Urikra and hermietkreeft, compatible with torrent)
  • Filehosters: DropArk + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on SUPER.ROBOT.WARS.V.REPACK-SKIDROW ISO release: sr-superrobotwarsv.iso (10,159,468,544 bytes)
  • 2 DLCs are included and activated: Impeding Departure/A Letter to Tatsu + Early Purchase Bonus
  • Alternative ALI213 crack is available in NoDVD folder after installation
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 9.5 to 4.5 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~1 hour on 8-threads CPU; ~2 hours on 4-threads CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 14 GB
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Giant of steel, a new voyage awaits.

The 25th-anniversary commemorative title, Super Robot Wars V is now on STEAM!

Experience the tales of the steel giants and watch the game unravels the original story from the collaboration of all 26 robot animation series you could ever dream of.

All 20 bonus scenarios from the previous Super Robot Wars V will also be available for STEAM! Let’s play Super Robot Wars V like never before!
